START.name: Starting place
START.desc: This is the place to start! The possibilities are endless from here. You must take a step into the unknown to see what this land holds for you. On the ground before you, you see a torch and kindling.

LOC2.name: The Fountain
LOC2.desc: Your leap of faith has led you to an empty, scum ridden fountain. On the edge of the interior, you find a compass.

LOC3.name: The Field
LOC3.desc: An expansive and empty field, flanked on opposite sides by a rickety home and an old church. There is nothing at all in this area. Your compass seems to be experiencing some sort of interference.

LOC4.name: The Old Church
LOC4.desc: A broken down and abandoned church, long lost to the pains of time. Across the field to your east, you can see the abandoned house. Within the church, there is an old picture of a frontier family, empty bullet casings, and a rusty knife.

LOC5.name: The House
LOC5.desc: A ramshackle hut that is far past it's prime. There is no sign of anyone having been here in some time. In the northern distance, through the trees, you can make out a barn of some sort. There is nothing of value or importance here, unless you have an affinity for rotten wood and broken ceramics.

LOC6.name: The Barn
LOC6.desc: Rough and rugged, a large barn stands in front of you. It seems to be as abandoned as everything else here. There is nothing else in sight. Outside of the large doors, you find a small gem. It shines with the brilliance of the sun.

LOC7.name: The Second Field
LOC7.desc: An expansive and empty field, much like the one you encountered earlier. Inversely, you cannot see anything in the distance or in your immediate surroundings. Your compass stops working once again.

LOC8.name: The Monolith
LOC8.desc: You've come upon a frighteningly large installation, uncharacteristically modern looking in comparison to it's surroundings. It hums with a tone that is unlike anything you've ever heard before. There doesn't seem to be any escape from here. This is it for you

LOC9.name: The Void
LOC9.desc: Your journey has now led you into an amorphous, nondescript area - completely devoid of earthly characteristics. Amongst the ethereal binding, you can spot out forms - shapeless but moving cohesively - further out in the distance. They look quite a bit like those that you saw in the picture in the church - the frontier family.
